metadataAttributes.Title: AI Workflow: Business Priorities and Data Ingestion
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is the first course of a six part specialization.  You are STRONGLY encouraged to complete these courses in order as they are not individual independent courses, but part of a workflow where each course builds on the previous ones.
